name: HypertensionPersistentICD10
title: Hypertension, Persistent ICD10
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains concepts representing persistent hypertension.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this value set is to identify patients with persistent hypertension.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD10 concepts for persistent hypertension.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes Hypertension concepts precoordinated with control terms (good control, poor control). Excludes pregnancy induced hypertension or other obstetric hypertension without pre-existing hypertension. Excludes medication induced hypertension.)
